Reviews.Title: Overall...a good decision
Reviews.Author: Chris Chistolini
Reviews.Content: I wanted a phone I could swap SIM cards for international travel. This phone is my first smartphone and I'm still getting used to it, I activated it through Straight Talk, at least for now. So far, it's worked wherever I've been and everything I've tried has worked.

Reviews.Title: It works fine
Reviews.Author: Thalia
Reviews.Content: In general I like the cell phone.What I don’t like is that it has troubles to charge the battery with the provided cable.It takes some time to react; for example while exploring the main menu if I change of page, it takes a lot of time to change it.  And I must say, I don’t have a lot of applications.I find the item ok, although I was expecting more, since it is the skyrocket.

Reviews.Title: camera
Reviews.Author: landon
Reviews.Content: After trying to adjust the settings for the camera to make the pictures come out clearer still the pics were really dark.

Reviews.Title: great
Reviews.Author: Gerald
Reviews.Content: Its a great phone. Fast access and great video playback. Big screen makes it easier to see and has so many apps to choose from.

Reviews.Title: ICS Skyrocket phone
Reviews.Author: Lester
Reviews.Content: so far excellent phone for only att unlocked service and android 4.0 ICS, really enjoy it with WI-FI keep up good work and hope the seller did good job for 5 star rate
